name: Kyle Cocowitch
goals: SBT GRVL Blue Course — having fun, feeling very strong, well fueled, good endurance. Want the race to feel like a breeze because of training. Less focused on time goals. Increase FTP by 15%. SBT is just the start — wants to build into bigger race mileage.
strengths: Mental strength. Decent endurance. Ironman 70.3 finisher (May 2025).
weaknesses: Time on bike outside (lots of trainer miles). Pedal and body efficiency. Knowing when to push and chill. Still needs lots of hours in the saddle.
strength_routine: Focused on lower body — squats, leg extension, leg curl, some core work
injuries: Meniscus scope on 12/3/2025 — recovering very well, no current limitations outside of unnecessary deep squatting.
devices: Heart rate monitor, power meter, GPS device
experience_detail: Ran Ironman 70.3 in May 2025 — 16 weeks of training with 9 workouts/week (3 bike, 3 run, 3 swim). Peak bike mileage ~120 miles/week. Outside of Ironman training, has run and biked for fun. Lives in Denver with indoor trainer setup. Training with friends Benjy Duke and Burk Knowlton for SBT GRVL.
schedule_notes: Full time work 30-40 hours/week. Wide training window 6:30 AM - 9:30 PM.
